channel.title: Breakfast on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Breakfast on Recipes

item.title: Nonna Pancakes
item.description: Ingredients 1 egg 1 banana cinnamon Directions Mash banana and mix with egg Add cinnamon to taste Pan fry as normal pancakes

item.title: Peach Cobbler
item.description: Ingredients 1/4-1/2 c. sugar 1 c. Bisquick 1 egg 1/4 c. milk or water 1 can peaches Topping: 2 T. Bisquick 1 T. butter 2 T. brown sugar Directions Mix dough Add peach slices Add topping Bake 350, 20-30 minutes Notes This cobbler is Rosa’s recipe, using bisquick. It can be made with other fruit, like blueberries.
